other_tests.findings: Diffuse thickening of the gallbladder with no stones and small pericholecystic fluid.

Gallbladder appears similar noting some distension and chronic wall thickening. Pericholecystic fat stranding also appears similar. Extensive lobulated peripancreatic fluid collections appear unchanged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In comparison to the prior CT performed 2 days earlier, the appearance of the gallbladder is similar. The extent of the peripancreatic fluid collections remains unchanged.
